metrics.description: Task adherence score given by Azure AI evaluation. The Task Adherence evaluator assesses how well an AI-generated response follows the assigned task in terms of alignment with instructions and definitions, accuracy and clarity, and proper use of provided tool definitions. Scoring is on a five-level integer scale: 0 – Fully Inadherent, 1 – Barely Adherent, 2 – Moderately Adherent, 3 – Mostly Adherent, and 4 – Fully Adherent. See (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azure-ai-evaluation/azure.ai.evaluation.taskadherenceevaluator?view=azure-python) for more details.
